name: Wide KDice
description:
It seems that style 4060 and style 1636 does not works, so I wrote from scratch new style for KDice. Give yourself a better experience and focus on the game, hide unnecessary elements and resize website.

Discuss, develop and enjoy :)


Version: 4
Characters (non-white): 3124
Groups: 21
Selectors: 31
Declarations: 26

Style effects:
	- Add text to log when is empty
	- Expand collapsed Player Panel by hover
	- Few minor changes
	- Remove App Store banner
	- Remove bottom margin
	- Remove Friend Boost from Player Panel
	- Remove Friends Panel
	- Remove Month Boost from Player Panel
	- Remove the footer
	- Remove the header
	- Remove the outline of the table, that appears during focus
	- Remove Yearly Member from Player Panel
	- Wide table


Tools:
	Firebug ( http://getfirebug.com )
	FirePath ( http://code.google.com/p/firepath )
	FireShot ( http://screenshot-program.com/fireshot )
	Notepad++ ( http://notepad-plus-plus.org )
